page.title: 09LEISURE: Ravensknowle/Lepton
page.content: There are several centres for leisure activities in our area. {Ravensknowle Park}is a museum and the grounds are a public park. The Victorian mansion has pulleys, fulchrums, bouncing balls and natural life. In{Lepton}cubs and brownies, guides and scouts meet. There are dancing classes and a keep-fit class for adults in the{Parish Hall. Lepton {Highlanders}is a sports and community centre for adults and children. They run teams in both indoor and outdoor games.{Lepton Methodist Church}is a centre for activities such as a weekly lunch for locals called Meet'n'Eat. Some of our parents sing in choirs or play in brass bands. There are many of them in and around Huddersfield. Finally{Woodsome Hall Golf Club}is quite close to Lepton.
